questions.question: 1. Identify the main goal of using the Branch-and-Bound algorithm in cyclopeptide sequencing.

answers.a: Generate peptide sequence in a random manner
answers.b: Align amino acids in a peptide randomly
answers.c: Determine the correct peptide sequence from mass spectrometry data

questions.question: 2. Which of the following is a naturally occurring cyclopeptide?
3. Find the total mass of VKLFPWFNQY
4. The collection of all the fragment masses generated by the mass spectrometer is referred

answers.a: peptide chain composed of two amino acids
answers.b: peptide chain composed of single amino acids
answers.c: peptide chain composed of similar amino acids
answers.d: peptide chain composed of three amino acids

questions.question: 6. Which of the following is not an application of the Branch-and-Bound algorithm?
